panel.title: DDoS Attack Prevented by PaloAlto Firewall

search.query: | savedsearch "PaloAlto Firewall - Network Compromise - DDoS Attack Prevented"

html.p: Description: PaloAlto Firewall prevented DDoS attack events. It searches for log_subtype=packet. (Uses Accelerated Report "PaloAlto Firewall - Network Compromise - DDoS Attack Prevented", enable the report to use this panel.)
Data Collection - Palo Alto Networks firewalls threat data. (Palo Alto Networks Add-on for Splunk)

search.query: `cs_palo` sourcetype="pan:system" signature="auth-fail" object IN ("Local", "Local_Users") | rex "failed authentication for user \'(?<user>.*)\'\." | rex " From: (?<src>\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | stats count values(dvc) as dvc, values(dvc_name) as dvc_name, values(src) as src by user | sort - count | `cs_palo_firewall_login_failure_filter`

html.p: Description: PaloAlto Firewall Logins on Local and Local_Users profile.
Data Collection: Palo Alto pan:system sourcetype's data. (Palo Alto Networks Add-on for Splunk)

search.query: | savedsearch "PaloAlto Firewall - Network Compromise - Inbound Traffic from Blocked IPs"

html.p: Description: Traffic coming from blocked IPs. The ip_blocked_list lookup (`cs_palo_search_blocked_ip_lookup_name`) is being used to identify the blocked IPs. (Uses Accelerated Report "PaloAlto Firewall - Network Compromise - Inbound Traffic from Blocked IPs", enable the report to use this panel.)
Data Collection: Palo Alto pan:traffic sourcetype's data. (Palo Alto Networks Add-on for Splunk)
